tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Dr. Geetha was an excellent doctor. She explained things to me very well and was always upto date on the latest research and medicines in the field of her expertise. Sadly she's no more. It's a huge loss to the field of medicine. Patients like me miss her warm smile, her calm way of explaining things, her guidance and counseling. 

She was our family gynaecologist with most of the ladies in our family and extended family consulting her for gynac issues or pregnancy and childbirth matters.

tags: None
review: I have visited before 4years for pre and post pregnancy she is well experienced and friendly doctor till now i didn't faced any problems regarding issues in pregnancy or after pregnancy i thankful for great experience i add with doctor.

tags: Wait time,
review: doctor didn't come you people should conform &  then give appointment  I had to see other doctor about whom I didn't know anything

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Without even attending the patient the temporary medication and scanning is recommended.(the doctor will check the reports after 4 days) . Because she is in some meeting.....when a person is busy in meeting why is the appointment available. Wonderful service.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Beautiful soul. Exceptionally good doctor
Very patient with ppl. She is like a fairy godmother.
She helped me delivery my baby boy through normal delivery process inspite few complications.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: Dr Geetha is an exceptional person with a humane touch for a doctor she has conclusively advised on the issue addressed.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Provides good reasoning and explains all the lab reports in detail.
Gives good nutrition and health advice.

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: Very friendly & explained in a simple and easy way about the problem . Felt very comfortable to discuss

review: She is a very excellent,friendly doctor the way she explain me and my husband is really very good and i advice everyone to consult with her. Thank u so much doctor

review: She is friendly and very good. This was our first visit, she made us feel comfortable and very good dr. I would recommend her for sure. Clean clinic & friendly staff. She is multi lingual.
